articles.title: FEESOS Launches New Education Initiative in Ghana
articles.titleFr: FEESOS Lance une Nouvelle Initiative Educative au Ghana
articles.excerpt: We are excited to announce our partnership with local schools in Ghana to provide educational resources and scholarships to over 500 students.
articles.excerptFr: Nous sommes ravis d'annoncer notre partenariat avec des ecoles locales au Ghana pour fournir des ressources educatives et des bourses a plus de 500 etudiants.

articles.title: Community Health Program Reaches Milestone
articles.titleFr: Le Programme de Sante Communautaire Atteint une Etape Importante
articles.excerpt: Our healthcare access program has now served over 10,000 individuals across 15 communities in East Africa.
articles.excerptFr: Notre programme d'acces aux soins de sante a maintenant servi plus de 10 000 personnes dans 15 communautes en Afrique de l'Est.

articles.title: Annual Report 2024 Now Available
articles.excerpt: Read about our achievements, financial transparency, and plans for the coming year in our comprehensive annual report.
articles.excerptFr: Decouvrez nos realisations, notre transparence financiere et nos plans pour l'annee a venir dans notre rapport annuel complet.
